name: ratemyuni
description: this is team 36 project: rate my university

scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install @material-ui/core && npm install @material-ui/icons && npm install @material-ui/lab && npm install react-router-dom && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build-run: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && node server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install @material-ui/core && npm install @material-ui/icons && npm install @material-ui/lab && npm install react-router-dom && npm install && npm run build

author: jiakaishi, mingxuanteng, meilinyang, jiayizeng
